website_summaries.verdict: This is the perfect choice if you're looking for a lightweight vacuum for your largely hard-floored home or apartment.
pros: Powerful suction that won't scratch your floors
Adjust suction with built-in controls on the handle
cons: This vacuum won't work well on carpeted floors
Some have complained about the filter clogging easily

customer_reviews.title: WORKS AFTER 3 YEARS OF USING
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum cleaner 3 years ago and was using 3-4 times a week. It still works like in a day one. Why, because I constantly clean filters, its very important. Suction power is 5of5 in hard floor and 3of5 in carpets. Canister container is pretty small. I had to empty it twice during the cleaning in my 3 bedroom house and once in 1 bedroom house. It cleans perfectly all my dog hair. Looking back in three years, I would definitely get it again.👍
customer_reviews.author: Nadia S

customer_reviews.title: Hose broke open
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this vacuum for a little over a year and have been reasonably happy with it, but suddenly the hose has a huge hole in it! We are pretty gentle with it, so it's pretty disappointing to see such a design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Eeksy

customer_reviews.title: How to make the handle longer!!  READ THIS
customer_reviews.text: Love this for a hardwood or Pergo floor! I saw some people saying it was too short. You have to open the it up. There is a gray piece on the tube that when you pull it, pulls out and makes it a longer handle!! I found this out the hard way!!
customer_reviews.author: JamieM

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking product, but is a sham to call this a vacuum. The hardwood attachment, stops spinning constantly and the rug attachment is useless. There is no suction at all! My home is cleaned professionally and I use this in between, needless to say the Bissell 1161 doesn't have much to pick up and still it stops picking up!! It has a very weak suction. Put your hand to feel, and you won't feel anything but air! If you do purchase, try it immediately and return it otherwise you'll end up like me....taking it to GoodWill!! Ive used it maybe 5 times and looks brand new. Please don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: KoKo

customer_reviews.title: Mold on the filter of my “new” vacuum
customer_reviews.text: My “new” vacuum just arrived to find that it had already been used. While this is not an issue in and of itself, the scratches all over the vacuum, hair and dust in the bristles and the mold that has grown on the filter of my “new“ vacuum is disgusting and inexcusable. Had I wanted a used vacuum, I would’ve saved money and purchased a used vacuum. Completely unacceptable. Unfortunately I cannot give a good review on how the vacuum works since I will not run a vacuum with mold all over the filter from someone else’s home. Returning immediately
customer_reviews.author: pierre medina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Vacuum for hard floors
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vacuum for my condo since I have all tile floors throughout. Did not want an upright since past experience has taught me that they only spit fine items around. I have purchased other Bissell products in the past and always found them an exceptional value as well as long lasting and durable. This vacuum surpassed my expectations. It is smaller than I anticipated but the amount of power and suction is truly amazing. It picks up the finest dirt and sand. The beater brush ( for bare floors) makes cleaning a pleasure. It also comes with a rug brush attachment that works great on my low pile area rugs. Another great product added to my Bissell collection.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen M Galione

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up very well!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product for about a year and have used it for normal household chores. The hook for the wand is so thin that the wand constantly falls out and the battery compartment door will no longer stay on. The hook snapped from constantly falling, and the plastic housing has snapped FROM FALLING. This vacuum is poorly designed. I expected a better quality product for the money. Buy this if you are wanting to only use the vacuum for a year and you want to waste your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Daria

customer_reviews.title: A bagless vacuum that’s great for hardwood floors!
customer_reviews.text: For starters this is a bagless vacuum. The canister lifts out and dumps out so easily. The filter is also a cinch to change. If you wanted to create the perfect vacuum for hard wood floors this would be it. The floor attachment glides along with ease. This vacuum comes with four attachments. There is a feature on the handle that lets you turn your vacuum on or off. There are also buttons on the handle for suction power. For me the weight of this canister vacuum is perfect. Love this vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: The Scoot

customer_reviews.title: Non-standard hose ends.  Cannot use standard attachments.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: has turbo hard floor brush with soft bristles. Cons: fittings are non-standard. I cannot use my other attachments, such as 12-foot extension hose for cleaning in high places. This model has a nozzle ID of 1.39 in. (35mm) and brush ID of 1.67 in. (42mm). All of my other attachments are for standard 1.50 and 1.25 inch devices. Since the attachments don't fit, I have not plugged this vacuum in to try it. Instead, it goes back immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum For The Price!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is really lightweight. I had a Kirby Generation 3 before and was not expecting to be so happy with such an inexpensive vacuum. The suction on this vacuum is actually pretty good. We have hardwood floors throughout with a few rugs and this vacuum works very well for our needs. My only complaints would be the short cord (I have to plug it in in each room), the hose attachment is a little short for cleaning up high but the canister is really light and lastly the brush attachment is a little course. I would be worried about it leaving scratches. Thankfully I kept my old brush attachment. All in all I am very pleased with this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: rhapunzel

customer_reviews.title: Great suction power
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum has great suction power on my hardwood floors. The only drawback is that the canister needs to be emptied more than I would like. My house is 1300 sq. ft. and I have to empty the canister once during use, and then again in the end. The suction power makes up for the cleaning of the canister. PS I have three dogs and two cats.
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: The Seller is Not Very Responsive, I Regret this Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I don't believe this vacuum is worth the price. I purchased this because someone recommended it and regretted it immediately. The overall suction is good, however this vacuum is not good when it comes to cleaning versatile services. I recently lost the battery cover for the vacuum. When I attempted to get answers on how to purchase a replacement, I received no response and no help from the seller. I am very disappointed and wish I never purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Vacuum for Hardwoods
customer_reviews.text: I love this little guy, so powerful, leaves the hardwoods spotless. I vacuum tile, hardwood, linoleum - it works on all surfaces. Absolutely love this product. Picks up pet hair and dust. Doesn't pick up large chunks or bigger pieces of paper.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, and good for hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum works well for the intended purpose, hard floors. I wish it had a wider attachment for doing my carpeted stairs. As other reviewers have noted, the cord is pretty short so vacuuming my dinning/kitchen area means moving the cord to another outlet after half the floor is done. Fairly easy to clean out the dust bin. The machine is light weight for moving around easily, and the big, soft wheels makes it follow me as I clean without wandering off. It does not do very well on carpet, as expected.
customer_reviews.author: L L

customer_reviews.title: 7years and still Love it!
customer_reviews.text: OMG I think I’ve had this vacuum for 7 years now and still works perfectly! I love the exchangeable heads that are handy connected to the vacuum for whenever you need to do detail suction. I love being able to wash all filters and canister after every use with water and soap! Love retractable coed with a button and the self standing clip.
customer_reviews.author: Roselyn

customer_reviews.title: Short cord doesn't hold it back.
customer_reviews.text: I know some reviewers have mentioned that the handle isn't long enough on this canister vac, but I didn't find that. I'm 6' and my wife is 5'9", and neither of us have any issue using the built-in telescoping handle for use on floors, walls, or corners. This thing is lightweight, easy to manuver, and has great suction. The remote handle is a nice feature, too. The only knock is that the cord is a bit short. Our house has plenty of outlets, so we can plug in as we move between rooms, but if you have a larger home with an open floor plan, definitely plan to add an extension cord to make this top-notch.
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: Great for a few months
customer_reviews.text: Initially I thought it was the best vacuum cleaner I had ever purchased however, a few months later it is working at about half power even though I keep the head and the filter clean. Unfortunately the filter is not one that you can take out and rinse you have to actually buy a replacement so unless you want to buy a new head and filter every six months I would recommend purchasing something else. I'm now in the market for yet another new vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Quiet, decent, adjustable suction Bag-free canister easy to empty Cons: Cord too short The bare floor vacuum head has to be kept at an awkward angle in order to function. Does not store well, i.e., the wand/head falls down unless it is leaning against something and in a particular way. The carry handle for the base is awkward and makes it difficult to carry one-handed.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia V.

customer_reviews.title: Super little vacuum with accessories issue
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and easy to use. Surprising amount of suction for such a compact machine. My only concern is the same as many other reviewers have reported; the duster brush and crevice tools are very small and hard to get the job done efficiently. I was hoping that after receiving so many complaints about them that these tools would have been redesigned and would now be included in your new shipments.
customer_reviews.author: JOE SCHUMAN

customer_reviews.title: It’s weak
customer_reviews.text: It fine for light work cleaning light dirt/ dust from smooth surfaces. Suction is not powerful at all. It small and easy to maneuver. It’s fine for vacuuming the bedrooms. Probably wouldn’t recommend it if you have kids or if your prone to bringing dirt in. Seemed like a good idea. I wouldn’t do it again
customer_reviews.author: Tin Man

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: First time out it was good. After that not so much. I cleaned all the working parts that needed emptying but suction just isn’t there. Buttons on handle don’t work at all. They even slide around under the plastic cover. They don’t seem to be actually connected to anything. Useless on area rugs. Don’t waste your money Save it up and get a real vacuum. Not this useless piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: MAVIS ALFORD

customer_reviews.title: Short Cord
customer_reviews.text: Great bare floor vacuum. The turbine-driven floor brush is much more effective than the bare floor attachment on my other canister vacuum and the suction is very strong. I would not recommend this vacuum if you have a lot of carpets. The only reason that I am not giving it a 5 star rating is that the cord is at least 6 feet too short which means you have to frequently change wall outlets.
customer_reviews.author: Don LaBonte

customer_reviews.title: Avoid, there are better options out there (I hope?)
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of use, it lost most suction. Hardwood floors attachment is thus unusable. We use the other one instead - though the whole point of buying this was to use it for hardwood floors. Contacted Bissell customer service, connected quickly, the rep gathered all the info and then put me on hold for 20 minutes. Even though I provided very specific symptoms as to what's happening, he merely listed local workshops that would take the vacuum in. None of them close and I don't happen to drive. Will just have to throw this on my bike and lug it wherever i suppose. Never buying this again. It's a disposable product with no longevity whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Wroble

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum is amazing! It arrived about 30 minutes ago. From the moment I opened the box until now, I was able to vacuum 3 rooms! It's powerful. You can adjust the power levels. It has these little hooks where you can stand the vertical tubing on so it's not loose and all over the place when not in use. Two reasons I haven't given it 5 stars: (a) It needs another handle to be lifted with more ease. (b) The power cord is long, but could be longer. Other than that it's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Lui

customer_reviews.title: I took the second vacuum to a Bissell recommended repairman and he checked it out and declared a ...
customer_reviews.text: I am now on my 3rd Bissell Hard Floor Expert Bagless Canister Vacuum and after less than 2 months of using each, the roller brush does not work. I took the second vacuum to a Bissell recommended repairman and he checked it out and declared a design flaw. I notified Bissell and they once again told me to cut cord off and send to them and they would send me a "working" vacuum. I received this 3rd vacuum on May 24, 2018, and today, July 12, 2018, it is not working--surprise, surprise...the roller brush is not working. Very disappointed and disgusted with Bissell!!!
customer_reviews.author: CHERi

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I like the machine for my new hard wood floors but be aware that the warranty does not cover brushes and other parts. After only 8 months of use I have had to pay for an entirely new hard wood tool and the brush that goes in it because those parts stopped working. This entailed 2 separate phone calls to Bissell because the first person, who spoke poor English, did not understand what my issue was with the first call. Nice enough guys, but makes it hard for me to recommend a Bissell product. Also the company should stand behind it's product for at least a year.
customer_reviews.author: shopaholic2

customer_reviews.title: Great, but requires a lot of maintenance
customer_reviews.text: I just updated my review. This vacuum cleaner is great if you keep all the filters clean. It needs regular maintenance in order to keep its suction power.
customer_reviews.author: Cristos

customer_reviews.title: The best vacuum cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This must be nearly 10 years since I bought this item. And each time when I empty the container, I am so grateful that I don’t need to clean, buy bags, and drag the heavy vacuum cleaner upstairs all the time. This is the best of the best! They even come with a second set of brushes and parts! I haven’t ended to replace any parts so far for 10 years! I guess I can save the parts for the next 10 years! People get tired to keep “updating” their appliances every five years. This is my kind of product! Love it! Love it! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Baobei

customer_reviews.title: Poor Plug Design
customer_reviews.text: My biggest problem with this vacuum is the plug. The plug CONSTANTLY comes flying out of the outlet as I am attempting to clean my floors. I never had this problem with my other vacuums. As far as it's cleaning ability, it is okay with wood floors but I find myself having to pick up the entire piece and lift it over certain dirt/objects to get it to suck it up. Otherwise, it just pushes things bigger than dust forward without actually sucking it into the vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ray

customer_reviews.title: Suction stopped working.... Customer service did not follow through...
customer_reviews.text: Although this vacuum cleaner is light and very easy to maneuver after a relatively short period of time it's ability to pick up dirt from my hardwood floors decreased until it stopped altogether. We checked the manual, made sure the machine had been emptied properly and cleaned the interior. We called customer service and they suggested that we might need a new filter and said they would send one to us, but no filter ever arrived. We finally gave up and threw the Bissell Deluxe Canister out. I am very disappointed in this product and Bissell customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Berman

customer_reviews.title: Totally safe for hardwoods!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the lightweight cannister and the suction is phenomenal and adjustable! Using attachments on stairs with suction power was great and unit sits easily there. The cord is way too short, unlike my upright Bissell, though, that needs to be fixed if you can't do a normal sized room. But the retractable cord is lightning fast! A larger brush for stairs would be wonderful as well. It does work on carpet, if it is low pile but it is a struggle because of the suction., (not a bad thing!) All in all, very pleased, tired of the upright battle and inability to maneuver under furniture.
customer_reviews.author: LORI R SALOOM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hardwood floors!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE the hardwood floor attachment. The profile is small enough to reach under furniture and it has a roller brush that helps pull dirt in. It's lightweight and easy to use on my stairs. The cord is fairly long and retracts smoothly. It would not recommend this vacuum for carpet. The carpet attachment doesn't have a roller brush which diminishes its ability to thoroughly clean the carpet. I use it for throw rugs simply to avoid getting my other vacuum out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after using 5-10 times with light vacuuming.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this vacuum. I ordered in February 2019. The window for returns closed March 2019. Vacuum quit April 2019. Now I’m stuck with a vacuum I only used 5-10 times that is worthless. $150 gone with the wind. Amazon, come on.... give us at least 2-3 months on items like this.
customer_reviews.author: G. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: NOT a great vacuum, terrible if you have pets or a larger home
customer_reviews.text: The suction constantly turns down and why it's adjustable anyway I have no idea. The cord is too short and this is a terrible vacuum if you have pets. You have to clean the filter and collection area after every room. Very frustrating and not a good value in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ward

customer_reviews.title: To be fair the vacuum has great suction works well on hardwood flooring and tile
customer_reviews.text: To be fair the vacuum has great suction works well on hardwood flooring and tile, but the cord is to short and being a bag less model the canister is to small and requires continual empting and the foam filers are a pain to clean but with a little redesigning the would be a great vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Harry J. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I do not know how many vacuums I have bought looking for the right one. I think this is it. We have carpet in the bedrooms only with wood and tile through the rest of the house. It is wonderful for the hard surfaces and, surprisingly good for the carpet (given the reviews). It is also lightweight and quiet. I am so tired of lugging around heavy, loud vacuums that do not work. Time will tell how it holds up but it is looking pretty good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Carol S. West

customer_reviews.title: Love this vacuum! Bye Bye Dog hair!
customer_reviews.text: Have 2 dogs in the house and hate the hair. This vacuum cleans the hard floors awesomely! Does edges even without changing the head to the narrow corner attachment. It has great suction. It is easy to clean and isn't a big mess when you empty it.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie A. Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Well, there is not much to say about this product besides that it works great. As long as you keep the dust filter and the cyclone collector clean, this vacuum cleaner will suck anything out of your hardwood floor or carpet/rug. The only downside I can think of is the cable length. Other than that solid 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: DiM

customer_reviews.title: Decreasing my rating of this unit
customer_reviews.text: The power cord no longer pulls completely out of the unit Significantly decreases your working area causing you to have to find a new outlet more often then should be necessary I Had to decrease my rating as a result
customer_reviews.author: avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this purchase. Delivery was quick. Does a good job on non-carpeted surfaces and cleans up all dog hair left by my two dogs. The ability to change suction for upholstered surfaces is nifty and works well. I wish the canister could hold more, but I am using it to vaccum the entire house. The filters are easy to clean so it makes up for that. Really like the power button on the handle too! Would recommend to anyone with hard floors and pets.
customer_reviews.author: shumi262

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to maneuver with plenty of suction.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy to maneuver. I find it has plenty of suction for hardwood and vinyl floors that we have throughout the first floor of our house. Does OK on area rugs and rugs we have need entry doors...not as good on these as the upright we used when the house was mostly carpeted, but still picks up most items from the rugs. For hard surface vacuuming though, I think this is a great value. Took my wife a little longer to get used to it, but she is quite happy with it too!
customer_reviews.author: Brian-B

customer_reviews.title: Good little vacuum cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: light weight, compact for small spaces, powerful suction, does a wonderful job on hard floors. Cons: bagless. I hate bagless. Makes for messy dumping. Does not work on anything other than hard floor. I have 3 small mats by sink, fridge, door, will not work on them. Overall I really like this vacuum. The hose seems a bit on the flimsy side. I vacuum 3-4x a week and it does an amazing job. Biggest gripe is its bagless.
customer_reviews.author: doodlebugs2001

customer_reviews.title: pretty darn good
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived tonight and I've only used it once but as far as the vacuums ability for hard floors, it's awesome. Picks up dog hair and dirt like nobody's business. My only complaint is the power cord is really short. Constantly need to unplug and move to a new outlet. Minor price to pay for a machine that really "sucks." The debris collection cup is also pretty small but it's really fast/easy to dump out and keep going. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: mike honcho

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum I've ever had. First canister I've had too. I have concrete floors in my home and multiple wool rugs and was looking for a vacuum that would truly work on my floors without "shooting" particles all over the place. Works like a CHAMP on my floors and rugs. Canister is small but emptying it more frequently than my CRAPPY upright doesn't bother me, actually makes me feel more accomplished :)
customer_reviews.author: Lorena J. Altman

customer_reviews.title: A little cleaning machine
customer_reviews.text: I like this vacuum. It really cleans the wood floors well. I even bought 3 more for Christmas gifts. That being said, it would be more efficient if there was a light that shined on the floors and a longer cord. The unit flips over easily. A few improvements would give this little guy a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Worked well at first, then....
customer_reviews.text: The part at the end with the roller stopped working. Can't get roller to move to "sweep" dirt. Also, the fabric/felt on the bottom to protest floors wore out quickly. Now it scratches the floor. Trying to find replacement part.
customer_reviews.author: ken57

customer_reviews.title: Great for tile floors
customer_reviews.text: Our house is mostly tile, and this vacuum works great on this surface. I wouldn't recommend it for the carpet obviously, but I have no issues on our tile and hardwood. The suction works great and I have no issues maneuvering it around our home. It is not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vacuum! It has picked up dirt and dust that I could not pick up before with my two other vacuums. I vacuumed two large area rugs and filled up the canister. The suction is powerful. The great thing is that you can adjust the suction power from low to high. The filter is easy to clean, and the vacuum is light and portable.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight vacuum. My only 2 complaints are that the canister fills up in seconds with light vacuuming, and the filter has to be clean extremely often.
customer_reviews.author: ItsBenReviewed

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite vacuum by far! The only thing I would change is the cord length, it is not very long and it makes it inconvenient to stop and move the plug just to move from one small room to another.
customer_reviews.author: matt lamkin

customer_reviews.title: Great Features
customer_reviews.text: I found that every vacuum cleaner has it's pros and cons. I bought this one because of the reviews and the size and weight. It's great for flooring and area rugs. On carpet it has very little suction. I end up vacuuming the same spot over and over. The multi surface attachment makes no difference at all. The controls on the handle are great as is the adjustable handle length. The vacuum needs frequent emptying to maintain suction.
customer_reviews.author: Cateyez

customer_reviews.title: Would have given 5 stars but.....
customer_reviews.text: Have been using the vacuum Cleaner for several months now on my hard wood floors and carpet. Does a great job, lightweight, easy to empty the canister. Power cord WAY too short, hate that I have to plug it in the outlet every time I go to another room.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: but works great. I am so happy I got this
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, but works great. I am so happy I got this. I have a wool rug in the family room and it cannot be vacuumed with the roller brush activated. This little guy has a separate attachment for it, but the roller brush stops when I use it on this rug so it is great either way. It really vacuums hardwoods well. Better than my Kirby does.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love almost everything about this little machine! The suction power is great, easy to maneuver around and reaches under furniture like a charm! The only thing that could be improved at this point is the cord length. That's the reason for 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Tiny vacuum but big power and excellent results! I love the fact that it's bagless and as long as you keep the filters clean, the suction is really impressive. If I could offer a suggestion to improve it, please add a longer power cord - the current one is pretty short. Still, it's a keeper!!
customer_reviews.author: Cooper B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for wood floors and area rugs. The retractable cord is genius - no more tangled cord. The on/off button on the handle and the wheels make it really easy to use. Plus you can turn the brush/bristles on off with your foot. Overall a very well designed product. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: AvaJ

customer_reviews.title: Prefer Canister Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the canister type vacuum. It is easier to roll around a room. I felt this one had good suction and did not sound like a 747.It maneuvers smoothly. The vacuum hose is long enough to reach more places for dusting. All in all I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: GUSSING80

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT do the Job!
customer_reviews.text: Only works good on wood floors, cord is way too short. Would NOT buy again. I feel I threw my money out the window on this purchase. Hardly any suction. Rip off!
customer_reviews.author: Arlette Twedt

customer_reviews.title: Bissell Hard Floor Expert Deluxe Canister
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Bissell expert deluxe canister. The first one lasted me over 2 years. I have a dog that sheds like crazy so this canister takes a licking. I must say that one thing that bothers me is that the paper filter must get cleaned (by banging it against the side of my sink) after every use. I have not been able to find replacements filters locally at any stores so I end up purchasing them on line which gets costly because of shipping rates. Still, I like this canister a lot and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: susyq

customer_reviews.title: Powerful suction but Poor assembly
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good vacuum cleaner for the price point (when it comes to a smaller apartment with hardwood floor and rugs) with great suction but it was assembled very poorly. As I used it I had parts falling off from the body as well from the dirt tank. I was able to figure out what goes where and re-assembled the vacuum cleaner but it is a disappointing experience.
customer_reviews.author: Mariann F.

customer_reviews.title: Insanely Short Power Cord
customer_reviews.text: Not so sure this was the best way to spend my money on a new vacuum. It worked wonderfully the first few weeks, but now the felt has come off the floor attachment, and it is very loosely attached to the base when I place the handle attachment for porting the vacuum around my house. The cord is insanely short, which is my biggest gripe about this machine. I'd put an extension cord on it, but there is no where to wrap it since the cord is retractable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ivey

customer_reviews.title: awesome for hardwoods
customer_reviews.text: Great on Hardwood floors not so great for rugs or carpet. not really thrilled with the fact that you have to change the head completely to switch from hardwood to carpet either, otherwise not a bad sweeper.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Coffey

customer_reviews.title: i loved it at first
customer_reviews.text: so-so. i loved it at first, but after a couple months there are 2 issues: 1, you have to move the cord way too much and i don't have a big house at all. 2, the wheels on the bottom of the hard floor attachment tend to leave marks on my hardwood. if i scrub really hard they come up, so i guess they aren't scratches per se, but its a pain in the butt no less.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ablassmeir

customer_reviews.title: Really great vacuum cleaner for hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking a long time for a great vacuum cleaner for hardwood floors. This one is perfect for hardwood floors and getting into all your nooks and crannies. The vacuum cleaner is small and light. It was easy to assemble and is very easy to take apart for cleaning. The only thing I don't really like is vacuuming carpets with this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Arrowood

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Small yet lightweight and convenient. This vacuum has all the features anyone would like to have in a vacuum. Adjustable power settings at the touch of a button, and a pause too. Don't let the size disway you. This little Bissell gets the job done with powerful suction and attachments that work well. The only drawback is the cord is a bit short.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Booth

customer_reviews.title: Roller brush died quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Roller brush died with a few months. This affected the cleaning capacity. Suction could be a lot better. It is lightweight and easily maneuvered.
customer_reviews.author: A.F.

customer_reviews.title: The suction on the wand is amazing. I've purchased some higher end vacuums for work ...
customer_reviews.text: The suction on the wand is amazing. I've purchased some higher end vacuums for work over time and this beats them hands down. I do wish the power cord were slightly longer, which I read about in a few reviews, but I appreciate the markings on the cord noting how far it's been pulled out. A longer cord would probably add more size to the body and it's perfect as is, so it's a fair trade off. The tools work very well. Emptying it is very easy. I was able to pick up the living room and stair case of dog and cat hair in one canister. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Near

customer_reviews.title: but now that I have used it several times I love it. Lightwieght and easy to pull behind you
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum took a little getting used to after a using a standard vacuum for so long, but now that I have used it several times I love it. Lightwieght and easy to pull behind you, love the retractable cord and many attachments.
customer_reviews.author: michael c.

customer_reviews.title: Too much power/suction for my soft high nap accent rugs
customer_reviews.text: This is one of a many vacuums I have tried, trying to find one that didn't want to suck my rugs into it. Unfortunately this vacuum is not right for my needs. If my rugs were low nap it would have worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Tris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Love that it comes with two heads, one for hard floor and one for carpet. Easy operating and does a great job picking up things..I especially like that it retrieves items near the baseboard. Its easy to manage, too. Only downside is I wish the cord was longer, but it is certainly a fabulous vacuum.I have carpeting and laminate plank flooring......I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Anne W Walker

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this product. I have hardwood floor with two dogs in the house. This is a new vacuum cleaner after more than 15 years I used Electronux. The weight is light to carry around and the hose is long enough I don't have to bend so much. Strongly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible vacuum, suction is low, the attachment head for carpets that's suppose to spin, stopped spinning about a week after starting to use it. Now, the vacuum won't come on at all! DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT, YOU WILL BE DISAPPOINTED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Roddy Belford

customer_reviews.title: Poor suction!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I ordered this product, but unfortunately it fell short! Our house is all wood floors with only one area rug, so I thought for sure this would be a great vacuum for us. It works ok on the hardwood floor (but not any better than a broom would) and it dose not work at all on the area rug. It just pushes the dirt around. I am contacting customer service today, and hoping that I just got a defective unit. I will update if I get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Conny Brown

customer_reviews.title: Best hard floor Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for over 3 months now. It does really a good job cleaning my hardwood floor. The floor never looked clean no matter how many time I sweep the floor, this vacuum made my life so much easy. My house is a new build so I have wall outlets almost every where so the small cord is not an issue for me. I bought it after reading all the reviews and it is an amazing vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: geek

customer_reviews.title: Bogus. No good.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars I would. This vacuum is underpowered, covers your house with dust when you empty it, needs to be emptied 4-5 times while vacuuming a pet-less two bedroom house. This vacuum would not work for a household with pets or children or for a person who likes clean floors. It's the most frustrating piece of equipment in my home. The handle broke after one time.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: One big flaw of this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: There's only one thing about this vacuum that is not good, and to me, it's a big one, when any part of the rotator of vacuum head comes off the floor (flat surface) the rotator stops turning and air suction stops. Therefore, if you have a hard to get to stop and need to angle the head you have no suction. In my opinion this is a big flaw. If someone knows how to change this setting, please advise me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a GREAT product. If it gets to where you do ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT product. If it gets to where you do not have good suction just order new filters. It happened to me and I took a chance and ordered the new filters and it works like it did when I first purchased it. Keep the old filters and clean them. Then you will have two sets and can switch them out from time to time. I LOVE it. Best vacuum cleaner I have ever owned and trust me I have owned a lot. Best for wood floors that I have ever had. The cord is short which is a pain but I just use a drop cord with it and it does GREAT!!
customer_reviews.author: Nanny

customer_reviews.title: Soul sucker
customer_reviews.text: After trying probably a dozen different things for keeping the floors pet hair free over the years I finally found this beast. It has more power than anything I have ever used before and blows away any cordless varieties. I think it probably could suck out your soul if you were careless with it. Also on a side note, my kitchen has that old popcorn ceiling stuff and I used this to finally get the dust off of the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: DoubleTap

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back
customer_reviews.text: We have all tile floors, 3 kids and 3 dogs, and this Wouldn’t suck up Cheerios or dog food. I sent it back as it’s literally useless for a household such as mine.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Great little vacuum. Very light & much quieter than my previous Diet Devil. Love that it comes with two attachments for floors- the bristle attachment works great on the tile in he kitchen Only 4 stars because the cord could be a bit longer. It’s about 10-12 feet. Otherwise very happy & would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lkt

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect vacuum for hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect vacuum for hardwood floors. Lightweight but has great suction power. My entire house has wood and a little tile with carpet in staircase only. Attachment included for carpet, upholstery and a crevice tool. Also has a power switch and suction adjustment right on the handle as well as the canister. Only con is the power cord is a little short for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl B.

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. Everything clicks or slides together perfectly. Not the slightest mis-fit. The adjustable wand is long enough that I don't have to stoop at all. Quite powerful for such a small package. I also like the adjustable suction for the wand. The on/off switch is so convenient as are all the adjustments on the handle. Retractable cord has just the right amount of recoil, too.
customer_reviews.author: GardenAddict

customer_reviews.title: After seeing good reviews I decided to give it after my Miele ...
customer_reviews.text: After seeing good reviews I decided to give it after my Miele died after 16 years. Well, all I can say is you get what you pay for. This machine is terrible, it's slow, you have to empty it all the time, it doesn't pick up dirt etc easily having to go back and forth several times for everything. I wouldn't recommend this vacuum to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Pai Siri Pal Kaur

customer_reviews.title: I started to notice that the suction was not as good as when I first bought it
customer_reviews.text: Well I purchased this vacuum about 18 months ago. I started to notice that the suction was not as good as when I first bought it. I am currently walking the vacuum out to the trash because it will no longer will turn on. I would recommend looking for a different product. Good luck
customer_reviews.author: paulette regan

customer_reviews.title: What's worse, the replacement parts are no longer available
customer_reviews.text: We bought this vacuum about 1.5 years ago and would use the vacuum about once per week for a one-bedroom apartment, and now more than one parts have broken because they are made of weak plastics. What's worse, the replacement parts are no longer available. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Kao

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight powerhouse.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little cleaner. It has terrific suction on high, the variable suction control and the hand tools are on the handle within easy reach and it has big rear wheels which allow it to follow along behind and roll over the cord or throw rugs without getting stuck. It can store upright and has a place to attach the telescoping wand. It is compact and sturdy. The only drawback is the short electrical cord but nothing an extension cord can't remedy. I love this little vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Reneeg

customer_reviews.title: Caution for those with little kids: very accessible batteries in handle
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good vacuum but disappointed in the lack of safety features for the battery cover on the handle. My small children like to try and vacuum as well, and when my 1-yr-old was pushing it around he dropped the handle and the cover popped open, shooting an AAA battery across the room. Yikes! Unfortunately I'll have to add electrical tape or something of the sort to keep the batteries secure and out of curious hands. Additionally, the cord is not very long. I can't even make it across our living room before needing to plug it in to a different outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Pete L.

customer_reviews.title: Great on wood floors and very quite
customer_reviews.text: Works great on wood floors, easy to put together. Easy to carry or pull. Hose and wand long enough, the cord is just the right length. Very quite and picks up great on wood... But I would like to have a power head for carpet or rugs, it does work with the suction only carpet head and I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: perfect ! using with cat litter/basement
customer_reviews.text: I just replaced a cheapo dirt devil and i couldnt be happier. The main purpose is using it in the basement for hard floors, cat litter and stairs. Positive: -automatic cord retraction -handheld buttons for low/high suction -sits upright or can roll flat -strong durable hose that is long Negative: -cord is a bit short compared to others
customer_reviews.author: Patryk

customer_reviews.title: Great floor vacuum, great suction and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum! It is all I expected and more. I moved from a house in VA with carpeting to a house in FL with all tile. Needed a lightweight vacuum for floors, and this is great. Don't have to bend over, it has great suction and the plastic bag is totally easy to empty and clean all the parts. Amazed at what it picks up. Highly recomend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Faithartist

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this unit except the short cord. I have to move the cord around my house many times- almost every room. It's also strange to me that when I do plug it in from it being turned off while moving the cord, it automatically turns on instead of waiting until I turn it on. I wish the upholstery tool was made better and softer for my leather couches. OTherwise, great machine! Would recommend for sure. It's so compact and love the color!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Wright

customer_reviews.title: Big improvement over previous canister vacuum. PROS: Power ...
customer_reviews.text: Big improvement over previous canister vacuum. PROS: Power button on grip, suction controls on grip, attachments accessible. CONS: Not much. Power cord on previous vac was a few feet longer, but wouldn't have noticed it otherwise. Concern about accidentally pulling electric cord out too far and not having full rewind afterward. But so far yellow warning stripe works to prevent that.
customer_reviews.author: William Ginn

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: A great product for my condo. Good on tiles, furniture and window blinds.
customer_reviews.author: Kings

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful on bare feet!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this vacuum for 3 months and I love it! There are no hard bristles to scratch my floor and it picks up the small particles. I run the vacuum for no reason other than I love it. My husband thinks I’m obsessed. No, just love the way it sucks up the dirt and makes my hardwood floors feel good on bare feet.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle B

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this vacuum!I got it yesterday and have vacuumed my hard floors and it worked like a CHAMP! My FAVORITE part, and a delightful surprise, (because I wasnt even shopping for this feature!) was that this unit has a long enough reach I can easily vacuum our ceilings. (which are STILL the little acoustic bumps.Now there is vaulting in several rooms where it wont reach...but the base unit is light weight enough that I could use a ladder and carry it. The suction is GREAT
customer_reviews.author: Virginia C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for my hard wood floors
customer_reviews.text: Great little vaccuum. Only complaint so far is that I wish the cord was longer. Otherwise Its great. Has adjustable suction, the attachments are great and easy to remove/put on. Easy to empty the dust bin and has washable filters. I read somewhere that the handle was short, but I'm 5'6" and it's fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Karen P.

customer_reviews.title: Hardwood Floor Cleaning now Quicker and Easier
customer_reviews.text: We have now owned this item for over one year. It works very well on hardwood floors, including eliminating cat fur, litter chunks, etc. It has made cleaning quicker and easier because it eliminates extra prep like dusting and dry mopping. So far, it does not seem to be scratching or damaging the floors.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: It is light weight and has great suction. I really like that the cord retracts ...
customer_reviews.text: It is light weight and has great suction. I really like that the cord retracts with the push of a button. Also like that it comes with crevice and brush tools. My new studio condo has all hard floor surfaces so this cleaner is perfect. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have to keep emptying
customer_reviews.text: I read how great this was for cat hair on hardwood floors. But every time I suck up a good size piece of hair, I have to open the bin and remove it cause it blocks the suction. Speaking of suction, it's almost non-existent.
customer_reviews.author: Errol Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Great Vac
customer_reviews.text: I have three dogs & one is a lab mix that sheds tremendously. I have both ceramic tile & vinyl plank flooring & it worked great on both. This actually gets all the hair up & does not blow it away as you are coming toward it. My husband even noticed how much hair was NOT left behind after my sweeping the floor. Easy to use, lightweight & compact. The only negative is the cord is too short. I have rooms that I cannot complete without moving to another electrical outlet. I will probably start using a heavy-duty extension cord to solve that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Cincygirl

product_meta.title: Bissell Deluxe Canister Vacuum - 1161
product_meta.description:
BISSELL 1161 HARD FLOOR EXPERT DELUXE CANISTER VACUUM
View larger With the Bissell Hard Floor Expert Deluxe canister vacuum, you have a specialized, lightweight tool designed to clean delicate surfaces, high and low, with powerful suction. Digital fingertip controls let you reduce suction power for area rugs and other delicate surfaces. Rubber wheels and felt treads won’t scratch or mark floors, and the brush has extra soft bristles so you can clean with peace of mind. The Easy Empty dirt tank, automatic cord rewind, and a full complement of tools make cleaning your hard floors fast and easy. Finally, a vacuum that’s made for your hard floors and your life.

WHY SHOULD I INVEST IN A CANISTER VACUUM?
Canister vacuums are generally lighter and more maneuverable than uprights. They are great for vacuuming under low tables and furniture. The compact design makes them easy to store and to carry on stairs. Many canister vacuums have tools and attachments that clean almost any surface.

WHAT MAKES IT SAFE FOR HARD FLOORS?
It has nonmarking wheels made of rubber and felt. The brush has softer bristles that are not as tough on hard floors as a typical vacuum brush.


View larger SPECIALIZED HARD FLOOR PERFORMANCE
Powerful, yet cleans delicately to protect your floor surfaces

View larger DIGITAL FINGERTIP CONTROLS
Easily reduce the suction for delicate area rugs and more.

View larger HARD FLOOR TOOL
Soft bristles are gentle on hard floors but tough on messes— loosening dirt that’s then picked up with powerful suction.

View larger NONMARKING WHEELS
Made of rubber with felt treads, they won’t scratch, scuff, or mark hard floors.

View larger EASY EMPTY DIRT TANK
It opens from the bottom for simple, no-mess disposal.

View larger EXTENDED REACH
Telescopic Extension Wand for extended reach and easier cleaning of curtains and stairs.
feature_bullets: Dirt cup capacity - 1.0 liter. Powerful, Yet Cleans Delicately To Protect Your Floor Surfaces
Non Marking Rubber Wheels With Felt Treads. Power Rating: 7 Amps
Compact And Lightweight It Is Easy To Maneuver And Store
Fingertip Control Allows You To Power The Vacuum And Control The Suction To Safely Clean Delicate Surfaces Like Drapes And Upholstery
The Easy Empty Dirt Tank Opens From The Bottom For No-Mess Disposal

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
